title: Found myself laughing while watching this so thought I'd share it

replies.body: The spontaneous dance parties are always the best.

> The spontaneous dance parties are always the best.

Its good to see people "playing" as in playful!!
Do you know the video with the two lifeguard Renektons? That one is pure amazing.
no, but you should link it so we can watch it friend{{champion:58}}

Here you go :)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG7R338JgqU

> Here you go :)
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tG7R338JgqU

I remember. And thank you.
That was a dick move on Pantheon's part though.
Yeah, I would report him for ruining a perfectly friendly dance party.

That was just a whole boat load of "What the hell am I watching?"

Ahahahahaha
how did irelia do that?
I had that once as poppy.  I charged a Trist just as she ulted me and I went flying half way across the map.

> how did irelia do that?

I wish I knew!!  LOL Whatever it was, I'm sure its probably been fixed by now.
I loved it, and I love you for sharing.  Thank you for making my day.
This is amazing! Just perfect XD Dance party was my fav part though :)
learn how to fkin gank u shitty top laners..
...better nerf Irelia? lol
I saw you Panth! Sneaking the Khazix kill in while he was dancing!
LOL, WTH was that gank by irelia? O_o
It's moments like those (from the Sion video) that I love the LoL community. The LoL community really is awesome at times.
I LOVED THE SIONS SO MUCH
